name: FlickSync - Mad Hatter VR
description: Players can take on the role of Alice, the March Hare, or the Mad Hatter in an Alice in Wonderland themed Flicksync experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Core i-5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i-7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 Storage: 300 MB available space
